degrees.name: B.Tech Computer Science
degrees.summary: Undergraduate degree for Computer Science engineering.
degrees.description: A 4-year Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science focusing on programming, algorithms, systems, and software engineering.

branches.name: Computer Networks
branches.summary: Study of network protocols, routing, and communications.
branches.details: Covers OSI/TCP-IP models, routing algorithms, switching, wireless networks, network security and practical labs. Recommended courses: Computer Networks, Network Security, Distributed Systems.

branches.name: AI & Machine Learning
branches.summary: Introduction to AI, ML algorithms, and practical applications.
branches.details: Covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, deep learning, model evaluation, and projects. Recommended courses: ML, Deep Learning, Data Mining.

branches.name: Web Development
branches.summary: Frontend and backend web development skills and practices.
branches.details: Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frontend frameworks (React/Vue), backend development with Node.js/Express, REST APIs, databases, deployment, and best practices for building responsive and accessible web applications. Recommended courses: Web Development, Advanced JavaScript, Backend Engineering.

branches.name: Cyber Security
branches.summary: Foundations of cybersecurity, protection and threat mitigation.
branches.details: Covers fundamentals of cryptography, network security, ethical hacking, vulnerability assessment, secure coding practices, incident response, and security operations. Recommended courses: Cyber Security, Network Security, Secure Coding.

degrees.name: B.Sc Mathematics
degrees.description: A 3-year Bachelor of Science in Mathematics covering algebra, analysis, probability and more.

branches.name: Statistics
branches.summary: Study of probability, inference and statistical modeling.
branches.details: Covers probability theory, statistical inference, regression, time series and practical data analysis using tools like Python/R.

branches.name: Applied Mathematics
branches.summary: Applications of mathematics to engineering and science.
branches.details: Covers numerical methods, differential equations, mathematical modeling and applications to physics/engineering problems.

degrees.name: M.Tech Data Science
degrees.summary: Postgraduate degree focused on data science and advanced analytics.
degrees.description: A 2-year Master's program covering statistical modeling, machine learning, big data tools and research methods.

branches.name: ML Research
branches.summary: Advanced machine learning and research methodologies.
branches.details: Covers advanced ML topics, research design, reproducible experiments, and thesis work. Recommended: Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Research Methods.

branches.name: Big Data Engineering
branches.details: Covers distributed data systems, Spark/Hadoop, data pipelines, and scalable ML deployments.
